arg.name: description_package
arg.description: Description package with robot URDF/xacro files. Usually not set, it enables use of a custom description.

arg.name: description_file
arg.description: URDF/XACRO description file with the robot.

arg.name: prefix
arg.description: Prefix of the joint names, useful for multi-robot setup. If changed than also joint names in the controllers' configuration have to be updated.

arg.name: use_mock
arg.description: Choose if to start mock hardware or real hardware.

arg.name: robot_ip
arg.description: IP address of the robot controller.

let.name: robot_description_content
let.value: $(command '$(find-exec xacro) $(find-pkg-share $(var description_package))/urdf/$(var description_file).urdf.xacro prefix:=$(var prefix) use_mock:=$(var use_mock) robot_ip:=$(var robot_ip)')
